A few short years ago, mobile was a “checkbox” buy: marketers bought it because their CEOs expected it to be in use. The problem was, mobile’s usage, measurement, and optimization were all far behind desktop, and the furious growth and optimization that programmatic buying brought to display could not yet be applied in mobile. Today, that’s all changed. Mobile’s tremendous audiences can now be addressed programmatically and within a richer context than display. “AI & Human Relationships” - In this final video, Rocket Fuel Account Executive Tony Price talks with the leaders of Bloom Ads, who express the importance of building solid relationships with their partners. According to Lisa Nichols-Jell, VP of Media, this “translates all the way down to the client.” Thanks to Rocket Fuel, Bloom can convey a “big agency feel,” but maintain a culture of hands-on involvement and personal attention to detail. Bloom thinks of Rocket Fuel as a genuine partner, not only because of the performance of the product, but also because of the mutual trust, confidence, and respect established between both companies.

“Reliability” - In this third of four videos, Rocket Fuel Account Executive Tony Price and Account Manager Katie Bakunas talk with Janice Alpeche, VP of Digital Media at Bloom Ads, about the importance of accessibility. Janice values our “hands-on attention,” and she trusts and values Rocket Fuel’s opinions and advice. For us, it’s all about matching Bloom’s energy and commitment to their business.

“Brand Safety” - In this second of four videos, Rocket Fuel Account Executive Tony Price talks with the leaders of Bloom Ads who express ongoing concern about where their clients' ads appear, and the importance of brand integrity. “Rocket Fuel has done an amazing job,” said Kathe Bloom, the agency’s President and CEO. She said Rocket Fuel made the agency feel confident and secure that our safeguards and best practices are protecting the reputation of not only Bloom Ads, but Bloom’s clients as well.

“The Foundation” - In this first of four videos, Tony Price, Account Executive at Rocket Fuel, talks with the leaders of Bloom Ads and reveals that the Bloom team was immediately impressed. “We like these guys,” said Kathe Bloom, President and CEO. “They feel and sound like us.” Bloom Ads appreciated how we took the time to explain who we are and how our AI works. As Mark Torrance mentioned in his 2015 prediction blog post (http://ow.ly/GiRlR), agencies will reinvent their role as strategic and creative partners to brands, and Bloom describes how they can do that with Rocket Fuel by being able to do more, focus on the right consumers, be more efficient, and get better results for their clients.
